QuestData.Title: Add 'em to the Pile
QuestData.Description: I've been collecting the skulls of the skeletons I defeat. I've amassed a small pile of them.$b$bIf you come across any skulls, you are welcome to add them to my pile. The huge pile of skulls seems to keep the waves of undead at bay and... well... it also just makes me happy to look at it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 16 Stinking Skulls from Cursed Mages and Scourge Soldiers in the Plaguewood.
QuestData.CompletionText: You seem to have your hands full. Are those skulls I see?
QuestData.RewardText: May my pile never stop growing.
